instructions.description: Stand with feet hip-width apart with barbell positioned over mid-foot.
Bend at hips and knees keeping back straight and grip the barbell with both hands.
Engage your core and drive through heels to lift barbell along shins to standing position.
Lock hips and knees fully at the top without hyperextending the back.
Lower the barbell back to the ground by hinging at the hips first then bending knees.

_comments.exercise_info: Barbell Deadlift is a strength exercise with detailed instructions and progressions.
form_tips: Avoid holding your breath during movement.
modifications: Adjust weight or resistance to suit your level.
safety_tips: Warm up for 5-10 minutes before starting.
Stop immediately if you experience pain.
Ensure equipment is securely set up before use.
